actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection

official_title: Encouraging Americans to purchase American-made products during the holiday season, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Recognizes that the United States has the safest regulatory regime in the world that better protects families and children. Encourages Americans to support American workers and protect American children by buying American products this holiday season.

titles.title: Encouraging Americans to purchase American-made products during the holiday season, and for other purposes.
